description: Finished tuning all the instruments one step down (only half of them actually were), added vocals, changed the overdriven guitars to distortion guitars, fixed the really not annoying and not very noticeable problem of most of the parts litterally not being in the same key even with the tuning fixed (seriously who tabbed this and thought polytonal Scorpions was a good idea ?), combined the Intro guitar and Lead guitar, made some slight corrections to the solo.
title: Send Me An Angel

description: Tuned one step down. my work
title: Send Me An Angel
